document.full_text: gulf arab opec members led by saudi arabia will push for an increase in supplies at a meeting of the oil cartel this week in an effort to support flagging world economic growth by bringing crude prices back below $100 a barrel.
document.title: saudi to push opec to lift oil output, cut prices
lines_and_colors: gulf arab opec members led by saudi arabia will push for an increase in supplies at a meeting of the oil cartel this week in an effort to support flagging world economic growth by bringing crude prices back below $100 a barrel.
